long_instructions.2-3 Artist 4: Help me complete the house for this cat.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 10:
Loop this code 12 times to complete
the pattern.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 12:
Loop this code 12 times to complete
the curls.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops Free Play:
Free play, draw something cool
with nested loops.
long_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 3A: Use a `repeat` loop to collect all of the nectar.
long_instructions.4-5 Artist Free Draw 1:
Free Draw!  Draw whatever you are inspired
to create.
long_instructions.4-5 Artist Patterns 7:
Let's modify the code from the last puzzle
to make this more complex pattern. Notice how the diamonds overlap now, try
changing the first "jump backwards" from 100 to 50 (half as far) - now how
far should the artist go in the second "jump backwards"?
long_instructions.Course 4 Artist For Loops 6a:
Make three small changes to the
code from the last level to get this!
long_instructions.K-1 Bee Loops 5: Use `repeat` loops to get the nectar and honey!
long_instructions.K-1 Maze Loops 2: Use the `repeat` block to get me to the pig!
long_instructions.K-1 Maze Loops 8: Use `repeat` loops to get me to the pig.
long_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep:
Add a second “move forward” command to
reach the sheep.
long_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep_2019:
Add a second “move forward” command to
reach the sheep.
long_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep_2020:
Add a second “move forward” command to
reach the sheep.
long_instructions.course4_artist_fwp_challenge1: Try running this program, and make changes to see what happens. Can you figure out how it works? (Or delete it and replace it with something totally different)
long_instructions.courseF_bee_for_challenge2:
Solve this puzzle with the fewest number of blocks
possible.
long_instructions.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2018:
Solve this puzzle with the fewest number of blocks
possible.
long_instructions.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2019:
Solve this puzzle with the fewest number of blocks
possible.
long_instructions.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2020:
Solve this puzzle with the fewest number of blocks
possible.
long_instructions.frozen circle:
A circle is a special shape. Can you figure out
what number to replace the question marks with to draw a circle?
long_instructions.frozen circle function:
Use the new “Create a circle” block to
create 10 overlapping circles. Don't forget to jump forward between circles.
long_instructions.frozen circle function in circle:
Now let's create 20 overlapping
circles, turning 18 degrees between each circle.
long_instructions.frozen circle function with parameter:
Here's a ”Create circle”
block that can make circles of different sizes. Can you use this to create
a small circle of size 5 and a larger circle of size 10?
long_instructions.frozen cross:
Wrap a “Repeat” block around these commands to create
a plus sign. Did you notice Elsa can move forward and backward?
long_instructions.frozen cross rotate:
Now try repeating it 10 times. How many degrees
do you need to turn between each line?
long_instructions.frozen cross rotate dense:
Let's repeat it 90 times! How many
times does 90 go into 360? Hint: It's a really small number.
long_instructions.frozen diamond:
Use a repeat around these blocks to create a parallelogram.
It's just like a rectangle but has different angles. This one has 60 degree
and 120 degree angles instead of all 90 degree angles.
long_instructions.frozen diamond mini snowflake:
Did you know every snowflake is
a different shape? Let's create a new snowflake by using another “Repeat"
block to repeat a parallelogram 4 times, turning right by 90 degrees between
each parallelogram.
long_instructions.frozen diamond snowflake:
Now, let's create a new snowflake by
using the repeat block to repeat a parallelogram 10 times, turning right by
36 degrees between each one.
long_instructions.frozen freeplay:
You've officially become a master artist!
Create a winter wonderland.
long_instructions.frozen perpendicular:
Now let's see if we can create two lines
that are at a 90 degree angle to each other. You will need to use the "Turn"
block as well as the "Move" block.
long_instructions.frozen snowflake branch:
Try using the ”Create a snowflake branch”
block to create three branches, which starts to look like a snowflake.
long_instructions.frozen snowflake full:
Now let's repeat it 8 times to make a
beautiful snowflake!
long_instructions.frozen snowflower:
Intricate snow patterns can be created with
very simple shapes. Can you make a pattern by repeating 5 circles of size
5 and 5 circles of size 10?
long_instructions.frozen square iterative:
It seems like we're halfway to making
a square. Let's put 4 lines together to create a square.
long_instructions.frozen square loop:
Hi, I’m Anna of Arendelle! Let’s make a square
with the “Repeat” block, which uses fewer blocks. How many times (???) should
the “Repeat” block loop the blocks inside it to make a square?
long_instructions.frozen square loop 3x:
Let's create three squares, turning after
each square. Be sure to turn by 120 degrees before each new square.
long_instructions.frozen square snowflake:
Can you create a snowflake using the
“Repeat” block to make a square 10 times, and the “Turn” block to turn 36
degrees between each square?
long_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep_2021:
Add a second “move forward” command to
reach the sheep.
long_instructions.courseF_bee2: Use a `repeat` loop to collect all of the nectar.
long_instructions.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2021:
Solve this puzzle with the fewest number of blocks
possible.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_03:
डान्स–अफ गर्नेको बेला भएको छ । तपाईंले फरक किहरु थिच्दा प्रत्येक डान्सरलाई चलाउने कार्यक्रम गर्नुहोस् ।
प्रत्येक डान्सरका लागि तपाईंको मनपर्ने चाल रोज्नुहोस् र यसलाई (Random) मा सेट गर्नुहोस् ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_03_2021:
डान्स–अफ गर्नेको बेला भएको छ । तपाईंले फरक किहरु थिच्दा प्रत्येक डान्सरलाई चलाउने कार्यक्रम गर्नुहोस् ।
प्रत्येक डान्सरका लागि तपाईंको मनपर्ने चाल रोज्नुहोस् र यसलाई (Random) मा सेट गर्नुहोस् ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_04:
डान्सरहरुलाई संगीतसँगै समयमै अघि बढौं ।

<xml><block type="Dancelab_atTimestamp"><title name="TIMESTAMP">4</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml> खण्डलाई उपकरण बाकसबाट <xml><block type="Dancelab_changeMoveEachLR"><title name="GROUP">"SHARK"</title><title name="MOVE">MOVES.ThisOrThat</title><title name="DIR">-1</title></block></xml> खण्डमा जडान गर्नुहोस् ।

तपाईंको डान्सरले चौथो मापन पछि नयाँ चाल सुरु गर्नुपर्छ ।

**Measures** संगीतमा समय गणना मापन गर्न प्रयोग गरिन्छ । यो अभ्यासमा एउटा मापन चार धड्कन लामो हुन्छ ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_04_2021:
डान्सरहरुलाई संगीतसँगै समयमै अघि बढौं ।

<xml><block type="Dancelab_atTimestamp"><title name="TIMESTAMP">4</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml> खण्डलाई उपकरण बाकसबाट <xml><block type="Dancelab_changeMoveEachLR"><title name="GROUP">"SHARK"</title><title name="MOVE">MOVES.ThisOrThat</title><title name="DIR">-1</title></block></xml> खण्डमा जडान गर्नुहोस् ।

तपाईंको डान्सरले चौथो मापन पछि नयाँ चाल सुरु गर्नुपर्छ ।

**Measures** संगीतमा समय गणना मापन गर्न प्रयोग गरिन्छ । यो अभ्यासमा एउटा मापन चार धड्कन लामो हुन्छ ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_07:
हरेक नर्तकको \_गुणहरुको \_ सेट हुन्छ जसले यो कस्तो देखिन्छ, नियन्त्रण गर्दछ । 

नर्तकहरु नजिक वा टाढा देखिने बनाउन हरियो घटना खण्ड अन्तर्गत <xml><block type="Dancelab_setPropEach" block-text="the set block"><title name="GROUP" config="sprites, "BEAR", "CAT", "DUCK", "FROG", "PINEAPPLE", "SHARK", "UNICORN", "SLOTH"">???</title><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><title name="VAL">???</title></block></xml> प्रयोग गर्नुहोस् ।

नर्तकहरु नजिक वा टाढा देखिने बनाउन हरियो घटना खण्ड अन्तर्गत <xml><block type="Dancelab_setPropEach" block-text="the set block"><title name="GROUP" config="sprites, "BEAR", "CAT", "DUCK", "FROG", "PINEAPPLE", "SHARK", "UNICORN", "SLOTH"">???</title><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><title name="VAL">???</title></block></xml> प्रयोग गर्नुहोस् ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_08: डान्सरहरुको "tint" गुण हुन्छ जसले रङको तह थप्न सक्छ । तपाईंको एक जना डान्सरको (वा पूरै समूह) "tint" परिवर्तन गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस् ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_08_2021: डान्सरहरुको "tint" गुण हुन्छ जसले रङको तह थप्न सक्छ । तपाईंको एक जना डान्सरको (वा पूरै समूह) "tint" परिवर्तन गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस् ।
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_09:
यो **नयाँ खण्ड** एउटा विशेष प्रकारको घटना हो जुन बारम्बार ट्रिगर गरिन्छ । 

<xml><block type="Dancelab_everySeconds"><title name="N">2</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml>

खण्डभित्र तपाईंको उपकरण बक्समा अन्य नयाँ खण्डहरु राखेर तपाईंले समय समयमा बारम्बार नर्तकहरुको गुण परिवर्तन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ । सिर्जनशील हुनुहोस् र रमाइलो गर्नुहोस् । 

\_तपाईंले पुरा गरेपछि समाप्त वटन थिच्नुहोस् ।

\_तपाईंले पुरा गरेपछि समाप्त वटन थिच्नुहोस् ।
